testcase.name: Accrodion test Should show the 1st item expanded by default
testcase.classname: Should show the 1st item expanded by default

testcase.name: Accrodion test Clicking on expand icon or title or anywhere in the title section should expand the item

testcase.name: Accrodion test when an item was already expanded should show the collapse icon in the right corner

testcase.name: Accrodion test when an item was already collapsed state should show the expand icon in the right corner

testcase.name: Accrodion test Clicking on collpase icon or title or anywhere in the title section should collapse the item
testcase.classname: Clicking on collpase icon or title or anywhere in the title section should collapse the item

testcase.name: Accrodion test when an item was already expanded state and clicking same item should collapse the same item

testcase.classname: When multi-select enabled, allowed to expand more than one items
